snippet: Seattle Seahawks defensive end Bruce Irvin has been suspended for four games after the league announced he violated the N.F.L. policy on performance-enhancing substances.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks defensive end Bruce Irvin is suspended for four games for violating NFL police on performance-enhancing substances.
lead_paragraph: Seattle Seahawks defensive end Bruce Irvin has been suspended for four games after the league announced he violated the N.F.L. policy on performance-enhancing substances.

headline.seo: Seahawks’ Bruce Irvin Suspended for Four Games
headline.main: Seahawks’ Irvin Suspended for Four Games
